recipes.name: Kung Pao Chicken
ingredients: 1 pound boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into 1-inch cubes
recipes.cooking_method:
1. In a small bowl, mix together cornstarch and soy sauce to create a marinade. Add the chicken and toss to coat. 
2. Heat a large wok or skillet over high heat. Add vegetable oil and swirl to coat. 
3. Add chicken and stir-fry until browned and cooked through, about 3-4 minutes. 
4. Add peanuts, chili peppers, and bell peppers. Stir-fry for another 2-3 minutes. 
5. Serve hot over rice.

recipes.name: Hot and Sour Soup
recipes.cooking_method:
1. In a large pot, bring chicken broth to a boil. 
2. Add bamboo shoots, mushrooms, rice vinegar, and soy sauce. 
3. In a small bowl, mix together cornstarch and 2 tablespoons of water to create a slurry. Add to the pot and stir until soup thickens. 
4. Slowly pour in beaten egg while stirring. 
5. Add diced tofu and stir. 
6. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Peking Duck
recipes.cooking_method:
1. Preheat oven to 350Â°F. 
2. In a small bowl, mix together honey, soy sauce, sherry, and five-spice powder. 
3. Brush the mixture all over the duck. 
4. Place the duck on a rack in a roasting pan and roast for 2-2 1/2 hours, until the skin is crispy and the meat is cooked through. 
5. Remove the duck from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes. 
6. Slice the meat and skin off the duck and serve with hoisin sauce, pancakes, and sliced green onions.

recipes.name: Egg Fried Rice
recipes.cooking_method: 1. Heat oil in a wok and stir-fry the peas and carrots until cooked. 2. Move the vegetables to one side of the wok and pour the beaten eggs into the other side. Scramble the eggs until cooked. 3. Add the cooked white rice and stir-fry everything together. 4. Add soy sauce and white pepper to taste. 5. Garnish with chopped green onions and serve hot.

recipes.name: Beef and Broccoli
recipes.cooking_method: 1. Cut the beef into thin slices and marinate in a mixture of soy sauce, Shaoxing wine, and cornstarch. 2. Cut the broccoli into small florets and slice the garlic. 3. Heat oil in a wok and stir-fry the beef until browned. 4. Add the garlic and stir-fry until fragrant. 5. Add the broccoli and stir-fry for a few minutes until tender. 6. recipes.name: Mapo Tofu
recipes.cooking_method: 1. Cut the tofu into small cubes and set aside. 2. Heat oil in a wok and stir-fry the ground pork until browned. 3. Add the dried chilies, Sichuan peppercorns, ginger, and garlic and stir-fry until fragrant. 4. Add the fermented black beans and stir-fry for another minute. 5. Pour in chicken broth and bring to a boil. 6. Add the tofu cubes and gently stir to combine. 7. Let simmer for a few minutes until the tofu is heated through. 8. Mix cornstarch and water in a small bowl and add to the wok to thicken the sauce. 9. Garnish with chopped green onions and serve hot with steamed rice.
